optimisme

Class MM

  • java.lang.Object
    • optimisme.MM

  • public class MM
extends java.lang.Object
    Title: OPTIMIST --- A 3D implementation for ImageJ Description: Optimism is a deconvolution method based on the Majorization minimization algorithm, devoted to bi-photon' microscopic images. Copyright: Copyright (c) 2017 Company: Labex Archimède, I2M AMU Aix Marseille Université
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Dominique Benielli, Caroline Chaux-Moulin, Sandrine Anthoine

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MM.MMParameter
      This Class implements attributs of algorithm parameters MMParameter encapsulates all different parameters of image and algorithms Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016 Company: Labex Archimède AMU Aix Marseille Université

      • compareResolution

        protected boolean compareResolution(double[] resIm,
                                    double[] resPSF)
        This method compares the resolutions of the both resolution of data if return True the dimensions are the same False otherwise
        Parameters:
        resIm - array of 3 with values of Image resolution in three directions
        resPSF - array of 3 with values of PSF Image resolution in three directions
        Returns:
        boolean True or False

      • MMAlgorithm

        public java.util.ArrayList MMAlgorithm(double[][][] y,
                                       double[][][] x,
                                       double[][][] xbar,
                                       int xmin,
                                       int xmax)
        This method performs the main algorithm of Majorization Minimization The method return un list of arrays End SignalNoiseRatio, SignalNoiseRatio 3D output image (x), internal algorithm Critere and NGradiant. y , x , xbar pointed to the same data, do copy for generalized algorithm
        Parameters:
        y - 3D input data of image
        x - input data of image
        xbar - input data of image
        xmin - minimum of x
        xmax - maximum of x
        Returns:
        ArrayList contains : SNRend, SNR, x, Crit ,NGrad

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        public double majorante1(double[][][] x,

        Hd1 - 3D data

        xmax - Integer parameter for max

      • critere

        public java.util.ArrayList critere(double[][][] x,
                                   double[][][] y,
                                   int xmin,
                                   int xmax)
        This method critere evaluates the criteria of algorithm
        Parameters:
        x - 3D data image
        y - 3D data image
        xmin - Integer parameter for min
        xmax - Integer parameter for max
        Returns:
        Array list containing; F (number) , dF : 3D data, wXY_Vx : 3D data , wZ_Vx 3D : data
